-Immunity to Fury Attacks cannot be stacked with immunity to Physical Attacks. The newest effect that grants immunity to certain attacks will replace the other.

A Vitality-type Sun God who can remove enemies' buffs and reduce the Cooldown time of ally Angels
Secondary Class: God - Angel

skills.name: Downfall
skills.description:
The Sun God creates a field of light that cannot be evaded, draining the HP of all enemies at certain intervals and giving it to the ally with the lowest HP.
Removes buffs from hit enemies.
Also, removes status ailments and debuffs for all allies at certain intervals and gives them an effect that nullifies status ailments and debuffs.
[Physical Type]
-This skill will miss when afflicted with Void.
-This skill pierces opponents' barriers.

skills.name: Godly Rage
skills.description:
The Sun God's rage inflicts Physical Damage that cannot be evaded on the closest enemy and surrounding enemies.
Inflicts Void on hit enemies.
[Physical Type]
-This skill will miss when afflicted with Void.
-This skill pierces opponents' barriers.
-All actions of a character afflicted with Void will miss.
-Even unavoidable attacks or those with Accuracy effect will miss when afflicted with Void.
-Skills with "Always in effect." passive effects will work as normal when afflicted with Void.
-Revival type skills will not miss.

skills.name: Forced Teleport
